attributes.action: forget about any consideration he or his Government may have of using PUBLIC money to fund political parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To date, polititians have shown they have a total disregard in taking care of Public Money (TAXES) and must not be allowed to waste any more money.  If they feel they need more money, then they should dip into their own pockets.  No one asked them to become politicians. They get paid enough for being on ego trips as it is!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
